verbose_text: Upon C. albicans stimulation, phosphorylation of the tyrosine kinase Syk and of the Dectin-1 signal transducer PLCgamma2 did not differ between wild-type and Vav1/2/3 -/- BMDCs (XREF_FIG A), indicating that Vav proteins are not required for the immediate receptor proximal events.
evidence: phosphorylation of the tyrosine kinase Syk
